meanings.definition: One of the paired female reproductive glands in which the ova are formed.
meanings.sent1: The ovary is where eggs are made in the female body.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her ovary to check for any issues with egg production.
meanings.sent3: The ovary decided to take a break from making eggs and went on vacation.
meanings.sent4: Her ovary was like a busy factory, constantly producing new eggs.
meanings.sent5: The ovary, like a treasure chest, held the potential for new life within it.

meanings.definition: A female reproductive organ in which eggs are produced.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her ovary, signaling the release of an egg.
meanings.sent2: The ovary plays a crucial role in the reproductive system of females.
meanings.sent3: The ovary threw a party to celebrate the successful production of an egg.
meanings.sent4: Her ovary was a bustling hub of activity, preparing eggs for fertilization.
meanings.sent5: The ovary, like a garden, nurtured the eggs until they were ready to be released.
